001package net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.InputNeuron;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.NeuralNetworkInitializer;
006
007import java.util.Random;
008
009public class PerceptronInitializer implements NeuralNetworkInitializer {
010
011    private final Random random = new Random();
012
013    @Override
014    public void initialize(Neuron neuron) {
015        if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
016            return;
017        }
018        for (int d = 1; d <= neuron.arity(); d++) {
019            neuron.setWeight(d, random());
020        }
021        if (neuron instanceof AssociationUnit) {
022            neuron.setBias(random());
023        }
024    }
025
026    private float random() {
027        return -1.0f + 2.0f * random.nextFloat();
028    }
029}
